messages.title: THE ISSUES THAT MATTER MOST
messages.content: Fighting for you against hard Brexit, Standing up for the NHS, Tackling the housing crisis

messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: Only Elaine Bagshaw and the Lib Dems are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought to keep Britain in, and we're determined to get you your say on the final Brexit deal.
The Liberal Democrats have a plan for progress. The Liberal Democrats will put an extra £6bn per year into health and social care, with a penny-on-the-pound income tax increase.
Liberal Democrats will build 300,000 badly needed new homes across the country per year, and support private renters by banning letting agent fees and taking action against rogue landlords.

issues.brexitEurope: Nearly 70% of Tower Hamlets voted Remain in the referendum. The Liberal Democrats are determined to force Britain out of the single market at any cost and risks cutting all ties with our neighbours.
issues.health: Our health and care services need urgent investment. This issue won’t go away, and we have a plan for progress.

housing.content: Liberal Democrats will build 300,000 badly needed new homes across the country per year, and support private renters by banning letting agent fees and taking action against rogue landlords.

images.caption: Elaine Bagshaw - Fighting for change in Poplar & Limehouse
